question: Which of the following clearly defines the Ripple effect?
option1: It is the ability of software systems to react appropriately to abnormal conditions.
option2: It is a phenomenon where a change in one piece of a software system affects other area of the
option3: It is the process of adapting generalized components to various contexts of use.
answer: It is a phenomenon where a change in one piece of a software system affects other area of the
explanation: Ripple effect states that a change to a single variable will have effect on the rest of a program. It provides a measure of the program's complexity.
